categories: Category:From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back

nodes.text: "Rogue Two" is a short story that was published in the 2020 anthology book From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back. It was written by Gary Whitta and focuses on Zev Senesca.

Leia rewards Luke Skywalker with the rank of commander and permission to form his own squadron after his incredible feat at the Battle of Yavin, however Star Wars 55 released in 2018 instead depicts Mon Mothma promoting him after the Assault on the Mako-Ta Space Docks at the same time she promotes Leia to general and Han Solo to colonel.
